title: Planning for Future vs. Appreciating the Moment

content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on the extent to which anticipating and planning for the future affects our capacity to, as DeGrandpre puts it earlier in the same chapter, “appreciate the moment and, ultimately, life as a whole.”
